channel.description: Recent content in substack on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: Hello, Blog System/5!
item.description: Blog System/5 is my new Substack publication in which I write about the variety of software and systems engineering topics that pique my interest. If that sounds too generic to you, it’s because it is: there are too many cool things to write about! And yes, this sounds exactly the same as this blog. Read on to understand the motivation behind the new publication and subscribe now to not miss a beat!
